rules_text:
When Hand of Fidelity enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your fealty to Plains is five or greater, transform Hand of Fidelity. [i](Each Plains you control counts towards your fealty to Plains.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Vigilance
Whenever Liege of Asham attacks or blocks, other attacking or blocking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
